text: Sérgio Luís Donizetti (born 7 September 1964 in Campinas, Brazil), best known as João Paulo, is a Brazilian former association footballer, who played as a striker. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Season Club League Apps Goals Brazil Brazil Brazil League League 1982 Guarani Série A 0 0 1983 0 0 1984 Série B 5 0 1985 Série A 24 2 1986 30 11 1987 13 4 1988 9 0 1989 0 0 Italy Italy Italy League League 1989–90 Bari Serie A 33 6 1990–91 29 12 1991–92 3 0 1992–93 Serie B 11 2 1993–94 8 2 Brazil Brazil Brazil League League 1994 Vasco da Gama Série A 14 0 1995 Ponte Preta Série B 0 0 1995 Goiás Série A 22 3 1996 Corinthians Paulista Série A 0 0 1996 Sport Recife Série A 17 1 1997 Bahia Série A 0 0 1998 União São João Série B 0 0 1998 Vitória Série A 1 0 1999 Etti Jundiaí 0 0 1999 União São João Série B 0 0 2000 0 0 Japan Japan Japan League League 2000 Mito HollyHock J2 League 15 4 Brazil Brazil Brazil League League 2001 CSA 0 0 2001 União São João Série B 0 0 2002 0 0 2002 Guarani Série A 16 2 Country Brazil Brazil 151 23 Country Italy Italy 84 22 Country Japan Japan 15 4 Total Total Total 250 49 ===International=== Brazil national team Brazil national team Brazil national team Year Apps Goals 1987 3 1 1988 1 0 1989 2 0 1990 0 0 1991 11 3 Total 17 4 ==Honours== ===International=== ;Argentina * Summer Olympics Runners-up : 1988 * Copa América Runners-up : 1991 ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Campinas
